alert.note: Alert for Perry; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry and eastern Yell Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ola, or 13 miles southeast of Danville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Nimrod... Fourche Junction... Hollis... Garden Point Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
